text: Baranakubaza (yewe Muhamadi) ku byerekeranye n’imihango y’abagore, vuga uti “Ni ikintu kibangamye.” Bityo mujye mwitarura abagore mwirinda gukorana na bo imibonano mpuzabitsina kugeza igihe baviriye mu mihango. Nibamara kuyivamo bakisukura, muzabonane na bo munyuze aho Allah yabategetse. Mu by’ukuri, Allah akunda abicuza akanakunda abisukura
